title: Bug 124777: Setting blank tooltip in chart title causes exception during preview
OB: When a blank tooltip is set in the chart title, an exception occurs during preview.
EB: The software should handle a blank tooltip in the chart title without causing an exception during preview.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the software and create a simple chart. 2. Add the title interactivity. 3. Mouse over the title and show the tooltip. Keep the tooltip text blank and click the Add button.
